Okay if it is a Chinese folk or daoist based belief 
wooden daoist sword used in exorcisms/defeat a demon I guess (usually
wielded by a daoist priest).

These swords look very similar with the ones used in Tai'chi practice
(with tassles and everything).

horsetail whisk (white)

You can chant mantras...but that's boring

just search google for Taoist Exorcism...I assume anyone of the sacred
objects outta take out a demon

Japan...
***In Karl Fridays "Legacies of the Sword" does mention old school
sword kata based or related to beliefs in exorcisms...the lineage
Kashima Shinryu is tied to the shrine of martial valor Kashima Jingu
(Shinto based)...very important shrine Serizawa Kamo broke a drum
there and came up with some lame excuse later "possessed by the gods
or something"
